DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and efficacy of dexibuprofen syrup and ibuprofen syrup in patients with fever due to common cold.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Dexibuprofen Syrup
DOC.criteria: Common cold with fever Age 6 months to 14 years Gastric ulcer Bleeding tendency Liver disease Kidney disease Hypertension Hypersensitivity to the drug
DOC.keyword: Fever due to acute upper respiratory tract infection
